tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE access_control_list (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    access_level ENUM('READ', 'WRITE', 'ADMIN'),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE authentication_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    password VARCHAR(255),
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE acl_lists (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    device_id INT,    user_id INT,    permission VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE authentication_data (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    device_id INT,    user_id INT,    auth_token VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE devices (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    device_name VARCHAR(50),    device_type VARCHAR(50),    location VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE users (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    username VARCHAR(50),    email VARCHAR(100),    password VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE device_logs (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    device_id INT,    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,    log_message TEXT );
